attributes.action: Apology from all political parties for the conduct of the EU referendum.
attributes.background:
The recent EU referrendum
Campaign has been conducted on a platform built on fear, intolerance and deceit from both campaigns and runs counter to the values of the British public which parliament is supposed to uphold. This style of politics should hold no place in a modern progressive democracy.

rejection.details: This is the responsibility of political parties, not the UK Government or Parliament.
